entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:36 AM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:36 AM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:36 AM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
